title: FROZEN DESSERT AND DRINK DISPENSER AND METHOD
abstract: A frozen drink and dessert dispenser (100) and method therefor. The frozen drink and dessert dispenser and method permits the simultaneous or alternate dispensing of two products. Further, through a dispensing valve system (400) controlled by a controller (502, 512), residue of dispensed product is purged from the product dispenser (100) prior to the dispensing of the next serving of product and product may be dispensed in predetermined amounts. The frozen drink and dessert dispenser (100) and method also permits the automated cleaning of substantially all of the dispenser without any significant disassembly of the dispenser.

motivations: Existing frozen dessert and drink dispensers may not allow for simultaneous or alternate dispensing of multiple products.
Residue from previously dispensed products can contaminate subsequent servings, requiring a solution for purging between dispensing.
objectives: Design a frozen dessert and drink dispenser that can dispense two products simultaneously or alternately.
Develop a dispensing system that purges residue from the dispenser before serving the next product.
Create a dispenser that allows for automated cleaning without significant disassembly.
methods: Implement a dispensing valve system controlled by a controller to manage product dispensing and purging.
Design the dispenser to permit automated cleaning of its components.
results: Enable the efficient and sanitary dispensing of multiple frozen dessert and drink products.
Provide a convenient and automated cleaning process for the dispenser.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of an advanced frozen dessert and drink dispenser with automated cleaning and purging capabilities

motivations: There is a need for a dispenser that can simultaneously or alternately dispense two products.
Current dispensers may leave residue of the dispensed product, which can affect the quality of the next serving.
Cleaning of dispensers often requires significant disassembly, which can be time-consuming and inefficient.
objectives: Develop a frozen drink and dessert dispenser that can dispense two products either simultaneously or alternately.
Design a dispensing valve system that purges residue from the dispenser before dispensing the next serving.
Create a method for automated cleaning of the dispenser without significant disassembly.
methods: Use a controller to manage a dispensing valve system that purges residue and dispenses product in predetermined amounts.
Implement an automated cleaning system that cleans substantially all of the dispenser without significant disassembly.
results: Enable simultaneous or alternate dispensing of two products.
Improve the quality of dispensed product by purging residue before each serving.
Simplify the cleaning process by allowing automated cleaning without significant disassembly.
openai_json.research_subject: Development of a frozen drink and dessert dispenser with improved dispensing and cleaning features

motivations: Traditional frozen dessert and drink dispensers face challenges with product residue contamination between servings and require significant disassembly for cleaning.
There is a need for dispensers capable of handling multiple products simultaneously or alternately while maintaining product quality and hygiene.
objectives: Develop a frozen drink and dessert dispenser capable of simultaneous or alternate dispensing of two products with automated residue purging between servings.
Enable automated cleaning of the dispenser without requiring significant disassembly.
methods: Implement a dispensing valve system controlled by an automated controller to manage product flow and purging.
Design a system architecture that allows for automated cleaning processes while maintaining operational integrity.
results: The dispenser eliminates cross-contamination between servings through automated purging of product residue.
Maintenance efficiency is improved through automated cleaning capabilities that require minimal disassembly.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Automated multi-product frozen dessert and drink dispensing system
